alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 9:36AM EDT until September 30 at 3:43PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New York NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 3.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 6.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 6.1 feet on 01/04/1982. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Saddle River Lodi 5.5 3.7 Fri 8 am EDT 5.0 3.1 MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 945 PM EDT.
